name: We Utter, "Fake Butter!" Online Trivia | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: Bunch of flowers made of the margarine whose "flavor says butter."
questions.explanation:
Parkay bouquet.

	Butter carvers do exist, but I doubt that anyone carves margarine.

Dread red bread spread.

	Unlike green ketchup and purple French Fries, margarine comes in just one color.

questions.text: Crunchy whole-grain cereal made with margarine made from corn oil.
questions.explanation:
Mazola granola.

	Granola is made with oil, not margarine (except in this clue, of course.)

antibacterial Imperial.

	Imperial used to be sold with ads that proclaimed it fit for a king.

questions.text: A poem about the margarine that makes everything better.
questions.explanation:
Blue Bonnet sonnet &Bluebonnet sonnet.

	Blue Bonnet's slogan was "Everything's better with Blue Bonnet on it.

questions.text: Showcase of Cheddars made from liquid margarine.
questions.explanation:
Squeeze Parkay cheese display.

	No one makes cheese from margarine, not even fake cheese.

questions.text: Medieval majordomo in charge of cholesterol- reducing margarine.
questions.explanation:
Benecol seneschal.

	Some margarines, instead of raising your levels of bad cholesterol, are designed to lower it.

questions.correct: Country Crock overstock & Country Crock over stock
questions.explanation:
Country Crock overstock & Country Crock over stock.

	This brand of margarine has two names, for some incomprehensible reason.

questions.text: Phew- the last one! Fake butter made with too much lye.
questions.explanation:
Alkaline margarine.

	Hopefully no one uses lye to make margarine.
